about_the_game:
This is a real-time combat Roguelite game, with the weapon and item systems in the game inspired by the design of the Fushigi no Dungeon series.

The game is still in the early stages of development, currently being developed solely. If you are interested in collaboration, please contact me.

Discord：




  • Eternal Resurrection： Death is not the end, but a part of the exploration journey. You will experience the cycle of death and rebirth countless times, constantly exploring every corner of the mansion.
  • Diverse Weapon Equipment： You can obtain various types of weapon equipment in the game, including melee weapons, ranged weapons, and magical items.
  • Survival Challenge： Your body will decay continuously until you lose the ability to move, so you must constantly search for preservatives to prolong your life.
  • Lovecraftian HorrorThe game combines elements of Lovecraftian mythology, and the monsters and events in the mansion will provide you with a terrifying and twisted experience.




You awaken in an ancient mansion, but have lost all memories. This mansion seems to be shrouded in a mysterious force, filled with endless terror and unknowns. A puppet boy guides you, leading you to explore the secrets of the underground. Your body is decaying over time, and you must find a way to prolong your life and uncover the unspeakable truth.

name: Sinthome

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 / AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 / AMD RX 560 (4GB+ of VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Sinthome is a first-person 3D action RPG game that blends Roguelike elements. You revive time and time again in an enigmatic mansion room, venturing solo into the basement to face horrifying monsters, seemingly never finding an end...
